SKT_FIRST.name: Ember, Charge!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc:
Attacks an enemy, and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
When the caster is granted <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color>, changes to <color=#ffd732>Help Me, Master!</color>.

<color=#ffd732>Help Me, Master!</color>
Attacks an enemy and inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Taunted</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. Increases damage dealt.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr:
적을 공격하고, 자신에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>표식</color>을 부여합니다.
<color=#28d9ed>찬란한 의지</color> 보유 시에는 <color=#ffd732>도와줘요, 스승님!</color>으로 변경됩니다.

<color=#ffd732>도와줘요, 스승님!</color>
적을 공격하고, 대상을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>도발</color>합니다. 피해가 증가합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp:
敵単体にダメージを与え、自分に<color=#28d9ed>標的</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
自分に<color=#28d9ed>【燦然たる意志】</color>が付与されている場合、このスキルが<color=#ffd732>【助けて、師匠!】</color>に変更される。

<color=#ffd732>【助けて、師匠!】</color>
敵単体にダメージを与え、対象を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間<color=#28d9ed>挑発</color>する。ダメージがUPする。

SKT_BURST_1.effect: Before attacking, grants Radiant Will for 1 turn
SKT_BURST_1.effect_jp: 攻撃前、燦然たる意志+1ターン

SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: シールド付与\n(攻撃力が高いほどシールド量がUP)

SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 弱体効果の持続ターン+1ターン

SKT_SECOND.name: Burning Injustice
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect)\nDamage taken by all enemies increases proportional to the number of debuffs inflicted on them.\nAfter being hit, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance each to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Burned</color> on all enemies  for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과)\n적 전체는 보유한 약화 효과에 비례하여 받는 피해가 증가합니다.\n피격 후 적 전체에게 각각 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>화상</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)\n敵全体は弱体効果の数に応じて受けるダメージがUPする。\nダメージを受けた後、敵全体にそれぞれ<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>火傷</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Blaze Like a Flame!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Grants <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies. After attacking, inflicts reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\nRight after using this skill, does not trigger an enemy's Counterattack, Revenge, or Agile Response.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>찬란한 의지</color>를 획득한 후 적 전체를 공격합니다. 공격 후 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>가 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소합니다.\n이 스킬 직후에는 적의 반격, 복수, 신속 대응이 발동하지 않습니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 自分に<color=#28d9ed>【燦然たる意志】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与した後、敵全体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、対象の<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。\nこのスキルでは敵の反撃、復讐、迅速対応が発動しない。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Radiant Will</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to inflict reduced <color=#28d9ed>Evasion</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>찬란한 의지</color>를 획득합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 대상의 <color=#28d9ed>회피</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 감소시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、自分に<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【燦然たる意志】</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で対象の<color=#28d9ed>回避</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間DOWNさせる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
